---
title: "Dashboard"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)

```


```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

rest_inspec <- 
  rest_inspec %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(
    grade %in% c("A", "B", "C"),
    boro != "Missing"
  ) %>% 
  drop_na() 


```


```{r}
rest_inspec %>% 
  drop_na(boro, score) %>% 
  group_by(boro) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~boro, y = ~score, color = ~boro,
    type = "box", colors = "viridis"
  )

```


```{r}
rest_inspec %>%
  filter(boro == "MANHATTAN") %>% 
  group_by(critical_flag) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  mutate(
    critical_flag = fct_reorder(critical_flag, n)
  ) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~critical_flag, y = ~n, color = ~critical_flag,
    type = "bar", colors = "viridis"
  )

rest_inspec %>% 
  count(boro) %>% 
  mutate(
    boro = fct_reorder(boro, n)
  ) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~boro, y = ~n, color = ~boro,
    type = "bar", colors = "viridis"
  )

```
